dependencies.description:

interactive visualizations in Python.

pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.description:
CallFlow is an interactive visual analysis tool that provides a high-
level overview of CCTs together with semantic refinement operations to
progressively explore the CCTs.
dependent_to.name: callflow

Modular profiling toolkit and suite of libraries and tools for

description:
Hatchet is a performance tool for analyzing hierarchical performance
data using a graph-indexed Pandas dataframe.
name: py-hatchet
